metadata.synopsis: There is a barrel with an arm sticking out of it, Clicking on it makes the characters comment. The comment is different depending on whether the player has read the Brewer's diary.
metadata.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_AClick on the Arm sticking out of a barrel at  - (-259 22 -101)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Is that... a human arm? Do I even want to know?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Oh - oh my. Must be what's left of that would-be extortionist.
